record.properties: Top = 336 Left = 244 Width = 843 Height = 348 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
Top = 0 Left = 0 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "ABOUT" uniqueid = 596C3CFDDB4E4182B8014ADF17C15A6E Name = "MR_ABOUT" tmrSql.Name = "tmrSql"
FontName = "Consolas" FontSize = 8 Anchor = 15 Height = 456 Left = 12 ReadOnly = .T. TabIndex = 9 Top = 36 Width = 936 ZOrderSet = 0 Value = IntegralHeight = .F. islog = .T. Name = "edtlog"
Top = 0 Left = 12 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_clear_black_18dp.png Caption = "ZAP" ToolTipText = "DANGER ZONE: ZAPS TABLES WITH NO CONFIRMATION" Name = "_tbcommand1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click m.msg = 'THIS PROCESS WILL DELETE ALL DATA.' + 0h0d0a0d0a
m.msg = m.msg + 'DELETE ALL DATA?'
m.result = messagebox(m.msg, 4+64+256, 'MODROBOT')
if m.result # 6
return
endif
close tables all
_logwrite('ZAP START')
use mr_addons exclusive pack
use mr_addons_api exclusive pack
use mr_blacklist exclusive zap
use mr_categories exclusive pack
use mr_dependencies exclusive zap
use mr_files exclusive pack
use mr_fileversions exclusive pack
use mr_instances exclusive zap
use mr_log exclusive zap
use mr_modids exclusive zap
use mr_mods exclusive zap
use mr_pastes exclusive zap
use
alter table mr_log alter column lid I autoinc nextvalue 1
use
_apideletefile(addbs(thisform.apppath) + 'data\mr_log.bak')
_logwrite('ZAP END')
_logwrite('REINDEX TABLES START')
_indextables()
_logwrite('REINDEX TABLES END')
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 864 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_info_black_18dp.png Caption = "ABOUT" ToolTipText = "LIST MODROBO INFO" tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand2"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click local atables[1], lnx, ncount, olbl
thisform.edtlog.logclear()
m.items = agetfileversion(aitems, application.servername)
_logwrite('EXECUTABLE FILE: ' + application.servername)
_logwrite('Comments: ' + m.aitems(1)) _logwrite('Company Name: ' + m.aitems(2)) _logwrite('File Description: ' + m.aitems(3)) _logwrite('File Version: ' + m.aitems(4)) _logwrite('Internal Name: ' + m.aitems(5)) _logwrite('Legal Copyright: ' + m.aitems(6)) _logwrite('Legal Trademarks: ' + m.aitems(7)) _logwrite('Original File Name: ' + m.aitems(8)) _logwrite('Private Build: ' + m.aitems(9)) _logwrite('Product Name: ' + m.aitems(10)) _logwrite('Product Version: ' + m.aitems(11)) _logwrite('Special Build: ' + m.aitems(12)) _logwrite('OLE Self Registration: ' + m.aitems(13)) _logwrite('Language: ' + m.aitems(14)) _logwrite('Translation Code: ' + m.aitems(15))
_logwrite('EXTERNAL CONFIG FILE: ' + sys(2019, 1)) _logwrite('INTERNAL CONFIG FILE: ' + sys(2019, 2)) _logwrite('START FOLDER: ' + sys(2004)) _logwrite('TEMP PATH: ' + sys(2023))
m.ncount = adir(adbfs, thisform.apppath + 'data\mr_*.dbf')
for m.lnx = 1 to m.ncount
use m.adbfs[m.lnx, 1] again in 0 shared
endfor
m.ncount = aused(atables)
= asort(m.atables)
for m.lnx = 1 to m.ncount
_logwrite(m.atables[m.lnx, 1] + ': ' + transform(reccount(m.atables[m.lnx, 1])),'RECORDS')
use in m.atables[m.lnx]
endfor
close tables all
ENDPROC
